profiles.title: Strategy Profiles
profiles.restore_confirm: This will overwrite all current profiles and data. Are you sure you want to proceed?
profiles.restore_success: Data restored successfully! The app will now reload.
profiles.restore_error: Invalid backup file. Please ensure you selected a valid IMI Compass backup.

backup_info.title: Backup & Restore Guide
backup_info.nature: Data Nature: All your profile data, chat histories, and strategic progress are stored locally in your browser's private storage.
backup_info.storage: Export Format: When you backup, a .json file is created. This file contains a complete snapshot of all three profiles.
backup_info.tip1: Regular Backups: Save your progress before trying major strategy experiments.
backup_info.tip2: Cross-Device: Use the backup file to move your strategy to another computer or browser.
backup_info.tip3: Security: Keep your backup files in a safe place, as they contain your proprietary strategy data.

ai.welcome: Hello! I am your IMI Strategic Assistant. I've analyzed your Compass nodes and profile data. How can I help you sharpen your strategy today?
ai.placeholder: Ask about your strategy, next steps, or specific pitches...
ai.book_call_instruction: I recommend booking a one-on-one calibration meeting with a coach if you need further assistance.

ai_responses.missing_data: I'm analyzing your profile, but some core logic is missing. To give you precise strategy, I need your {{missing}} completed. Shall we head to those tabs first?
ai_responses.greeting_new: Hello {{level}}! I'm the IMI Logic Engine. I've synthesized a strategy for {{brand}} targeting {{role}}s in {{industry}}. What strategic insight do you need first?
ai_responses.greeting_returning: Welcome back, {{level}}. I've synthesized your latest progress on {{brand}}. What's our next strategic move?
ai_responses.next_step: Based on your **{{level}}** status, your next critical move for {{brand}} is aligning your {{objective}} roadmap with current market signals. Ensure your connection with {{role}}s centers on solving {{painPoint}}. Should I pull up the exact checklist for your current milestone?
ai_responses.pitch_improve: To dominate {{industry}}, you must leverage **{{usp}}** as a weapon against {{painPoint}}. Most {{role}}s are tired of generic offers; our logic suggests a 'High-Trust' pivot. Shall I draft a specific hook for your next outreach?
ai_responses.compass_analysis: Analyzing your recent trajectory through the **{{nodeId}}** node. My synthesis: "{{highlight}}". This is the leverage point for your {{objective}} goal. How should we apply this to {{brand}} today?
ai_responses.compass_missing: I notice you haven't engaged with specific Compass nodes recently. For {{brand}} to scale, we need to analyze your 'Trust' or 'Conversion' nodes. Head to the Compass tab, click a node, then return here for a deep strategic synthesis.
ai_responses.who_am_i: You are an **{{level}}** building **{{brand}}** for the {{targetIndustry}} sector. Your current objective is **{{objective}}**, and we are focusing on solving {{painPoint}} for {{role}}s using your unique **{{usp}}**. Is there a specific part of this profile you'd like to optimize?
ai_responses.clarify_intent: I understand you're asking about {{topic}}. Could you clarify if you mean: {{options}}?
ai_responses.disambiguation: I detected multiple requests. Would you like help with:
ai_responses.confidence_low: I'm not entirely sure, but based on your {{context}}, I suggest:
ai_responses.suggest_completion: To give you better advice, please complete your {{missing}} first.
ai_responses.stuck_detection: I notice we've been discussing {{topic}} several times. Would you like to try a different approach or get help with something else?
ai_responses.no_match: I'm not sure how to help with '{{input}}'. Here are some things I can assist with:

advisor.title: Strategic Pitch Master
advisor.description: All your IMI insights consolidated into winning pitches and messages.

pitches.content: You know how {{role}} struggle with {{pain}}? I've developed {{product}} that specifically helps {{industry}} companies achieve {{benefit}}. Unlike traditional approaches, we focus on {{diff}}{{userLevel}} to ensure {{brand}} stays ahead.{{adviceText}}
Most {{industry}} competitors ignore {{values}}. At {{brand}}, we align your {{product}} with {{objective}} goals to bypass {{pain}} entirely. Remember: {{adviceText}}

Stop letting {{pain}} drain your resources. {{product}} was engineered for {{industry}} to turn that specific bottleneck into {{benefit}}. This is the {{diff}} your {{role}} teams have been waiting for.
Efficiency in {{industry}} isn't just about software; it's about {{objective}}. {{brand}} combines your current {{product}} with a focus on {{diff}} to deliver {{benefit}} in record time.
The future of {{industry}} belongs to those who master {{objective}}. With {{product}}, {{brand}} is redefining how {{role}} achieve {{benefit}}. We don't just solve {{pain}}; we automate excellence.
Imagine a world where {{pain}} no longer limits your {{brand}}. By leveraging {{product}} and our {{diff}}, you can finally scale {{objective}} without compromise.
After analyzing 200+ {{industry}} companies, we found {{pain}} is the #1 killer of {{objective}}. {{product}} is the only solution that utilizes {{diff}} to guarantee {{benefit}} for {{role}}.
The data is clear: {{industry}} needs better {{product}}. {{brand}} delivers {{benefit}} by mapping your {{objective}} against {{values}}.
We started {{brand}} because we were tired of seeing {{role}} struggle with {{pain}}. {{product}} is our answer‚Äîa simple, {{diff}} approach to {{benefit}} in the {{industry}} space.
Join the {{industry}} leaders who have moved beyond {{pain}} and into {{objective}}. Our {{product}} makes the transition to {{benefit}} feel natural and rewarding.

outreach.content: Hi [First Name], I noticed your work in {{industry}}. As a fellow professional focused on {{objective}}, I'd love to connect and share insights on how {{role}}s are tackling {{pain}}.

Subject: Solving {{pain}} at [Company]

Hi [Name],

I've followed [Company] in {{industry}}. We recently helped a similar brand achieve {{benefit}} by focusing on {{objective}}. Worth a 10-minute chat about {{product}}?
Hi [Name], wondered if you've seen the recent shift in {{industry}} regarding {{pain}}. I'm seeing a lot of {{role}}s moving toward {{objective}}‚Äîwould love to connect.

Subject: {{benefit}} for your {{role}} team

Hi [Name], we just finished a project in {{industry}} that reduced {{pain}} by 40%. Given your focus on {{objective}}, I thought our {{brand}} approach might interest you.
Hi [Name], I'm researching how {{role}}s manage {{pain}} in the {{industry}} space. At {{brand}}, we've found a way to automate {{objective}}. Love to connect.

Subject: A better way to {{objective}}?

Hi [Name], are you still dealing with {{pain}}? Our {{product}} was designed to help {{industry}} brands like yours hit {{benefit}} without the usual headache.
Hi [Name], connecting with fellow {{industry}} experts. I specialize in helping {{role}} transitions from {{pain}} to {{objective}}. Hope to learn more about [Company]!

Subject: Referral intro: {{brand}} & [Company]

Hi [Name], I was looking at your {{industry}} footprint and noticed a potential for {{benefit}}. Our {{product}} has been a game-changer for {{role}}s struggling with {{pain}}.
Hi [Name], love what you're doing at [Company]. I'm working with {{industry}} leaders on {{objective}} strategies. Let's connect and trade notes.

Subject: Quick question about {{industry}} growth

Hi [Name], I have a quick idea on how to solve {{pain}} for [Company] using {{diff}}. No pitch, just a 5-min intro if you're curious?

qa.q: How does this alignment improve my ROI?
qa.a: By focusing on your {{objective}}, we eliminate the 30% waste usually spent on misaligned marketing efforts. This ensures every dollar spent on {{product}} directly supports your outcome.

qa.q: What makes this different from other strategies?
qa.a: Most strategies are generic. Yours is built on the unique intersection of {{brand}} personality and the deep emotional triggers of your {{role}}s.

qa.q: How quickly can I expect results?
qa.a: Because we leverage your existing {{voice}} and pair it with {{product}}, most clients see a shift in prospect engagement within the first 14 days of implementation.

qa.q: Is this scalable for larger teams?
qa.a: Absolutely. The {{diff}} we've defined is designed for {{objective}} scenarios, making it easy to replicate across multiple {{industry}} teams.

qa.q: What are the common pitfalls to avoid?
qa.a: The biggest risk in {{industry}} is falling back into {{pain}}. Stay focused on your {{objective}} and the specific {{values}} we've identified.

qa.q: How do I handle objections about price?
qa.a: Shift the focus from cost to the {{benefit}}. Your {{product}} isn't an expense; it's the antidote to the {{bottlenecks}} they are facing.

qa.q: Can this work for a brand new product?
qa.a: Yes, in fact it's better. By starting with the {{brand}} foundation and mapping directly to {{role}} needs, you bypass the 'testing' phase most brands waste months on.

qa.q: How do I maintain brand consistency?
qa.a: Use the {{voice}} we established in the Brand Evaluator. They are designed to keep your messaging cohesive across all {{channels}}.

qa.q: What should my first 24 hours look like?
qa.a: Start by sending the {{variation}} outreach messages to 5 key {{role}}s. Use the {{product}} UVP as your central hook.

qa.q: How do I measure success beyond sales?
qa.a: Track the quality of the conversations. If {{role}}s are responding with curiosity about your {{diff}}, your {{objective}} strategy is working.

connection.title: Situation Hook
connection.guide: "I'd love to hear where you are right now in {{problem}}."
connection.why: Surfaces the Situation early and shows genuine curiosity.

rapport_desire.title: Desire Discovery
rapport_desire.guide: "If you had the ideal outcome in {{problem}}, what would it look like for you?"
rapport_desire.why: Shifts from where they are ‚Üí where they want to be.

rapport_conflict.title: Conflict Validation
rapport_conflict.guide: "What's been the biggest challenge keeping you from that result?"
rapport_conflict.why: Gets to the Conflict, allows empathy, and builds trust.

presenting.title: Mapping Product to Prospect
presenting.guide: "What you've just described connects directly with how {{productName}} works. For example, you mentioned {{painPoint}}, and our approach addresses that."
presenting.why: Directly links their story to your product.

closing.title: Trial Close
closing.guide: "If we could solve {{painPoint}} and help you reach {{desire}}, would you feel comfortable moving forward with a trial/next step?"
closing.why: Checks readiness and leads toward decision.

questions.what_label: Define your offering clearly. What value do you provide?
questions.what_placeholder: e.g. A premium consulting service for solopreneurs...
questions.who_label: Who is your absolute ideal customer?
questions.who_placeholder: e.g. Data-driven marketing managers in Tech...
questions.how_label: How do they find you or use your service?

results.title: Your Brand Evaluation Results
results.subtitle: Comprehensive analysis based on 8 key brand metrics
results.cta_guidance: Get personalized guidance to take your brand to the next level
results.next_step_desc: Your brand foundation is evaluated. Now define your product positioning.

clarity.title: Improve Clarity
clarity.desc: Make your offer more specific and concrete. Avoid jargon and clearly explain what you do, how it works, and the tangible benefits customers receive.

relevance.title: Strengthen Relevance
relevance.desc: Connect more directly to your audience's pain points and desires. Research your target market deeper and address their specific challenges explicitly.

emotionalResonance.title: Enhance Emotional Connection
emotionalResonance.desc: Incorporate more emotional triggers and benefits. Go beyond functional features to explain how your offering makes people feel and transforms their lives.

originality.title: Increase Differentiation
originality.desc: Clarify what makes you unique. Identify your distinctive angle, avoid generic claims, and emphasize specific features or approaches that set you apart.

storytelling.title: Develop Your Narrative
storytelling.desc: Create a more compelling story arc. Connect the problem, solution, and transformation more fluidly. Show the journey your customers take with your brand.

scalability.title: Expand Market Potential
scalability.desc: Broaden your target audience or clarify how your solution can serve multiple segments. Consider how your offering can grow and adapt to different markets.

commercialAppeal.title: Strengthen Business Model
commercialAppeal.desc: Clarify your monetization strategy and value proposition. Make the business case stronger by emphasizing ROI, efficiency gains, or cost savings for customers.

consistency.title: Improve Coherence
consistency.desc: Ensure your What, Who, and How align seamlessly. Use consistent terminology and themes across all three elements to create a unified brand message.

general.title: General Improvement
general.desc: Continue refining this aspect of your brand strategy.

refinement_needed.title: Strategic Brand Refinement Needed
refinement_needed.desc: Consider working with a brand strategist to refine your core messaging and positioning. Your foundation needs strengthening before scaling.

ready_to_scale.title: Strong Foundation - Ready to Scale
ready_to_scale.desc: Your brand has a solid foundation. Focus on execution, testing your messaging in the market, and gathering customer feedback to optimize further.

prospect_profiler.title: Prospect Insights Engine
prospect_profiler.subtitle: Synthesize the deep emotional triggers of your ideal audience.

messages.curiosity_b2c: Most people in the {{industry}} community are missing one simple thing that changes everything.
messages.data_driven_b2c: I've analyzed the results from over 500 {{role}} individuals, and the data is clear.
messages.connection_b2c: I saw your passion for {{role}} and wanted to share something relevant to {{industry}}.
messages.pain_point_b2c: I know how frustrating {{painPoint}} can be for anyone in the {{industry}} world.
messages.credibility: This approach has helped clients achieve 35% improvement in just 8 weeks.
messages.cta: Would you be open to a 15-minute conversation about applying this to your situation?

who.title: WHO: The Audience Core
who.definition: The specific human being whose problem you are solving. Not a 'demographic,' but a person with desires, fears, and goals.
who.system: In the IMI System, the 'Who' dictates every other decision. If you miss the Who, your 'What' (Product) is irrelevant and your 'How' (Method) is noise. We validate the Who through their pain points, not their job titles.
questions: What keeps them awake at 3 AM?
What have they already tried that failed?

brand.title: BRAND: The Identity & Trust
brand.definition: The reputation and promise you make to the market. It is the 'Soul' of the business that exists before a single product is sold.
brand.system: Your Brand is the container for trust. In High-Trust sales, the Brand must signal 'Expert' and 'Guide' before it signals 'Vendor.' We build the Brand on core values (Intentions) rather than just aesthetics.
questions: If your brand was a person, who would it be?
What is the one thing you will never do for money?

product.title: PRODUCT: The Vehicle of Transformation
product.definition: The tangible tool or service that bridges the gap between the Client's current pain and their desired future.
product.system: The Product is not the hero; it is the sword the hero uses to slay the dragon. We position the Product as the logical solution to a specific problem (The 'What'), validated by a unique mechanism (The 'How').
questions: What specific result does it guarantee?
How is it different from the status quo?
Can you explain it to a 5-year-old?

service.title: SERVICE: The Delivery & Experience
service.definition: How the value is transferred and experienced by the client. It is the 'How' in action.
service.system: Great Service turns a Transaction (Conversion) into a Relationship (Retention). In the Compass, Service is where the promise (Brand) meets reality. It is about removing friction and adding delight.
questions: Where is the friction in your delivery?
How do you make them feel special?
